message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500.
I'm really interested in the product, but $9500 is a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $8200.
I understand that $9500 might be a bit steep for you, Bob. However, I'm still willing to work with you. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $9000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm willing to consider your offer, Bob. However, I'm not quite ready to go as low as $8500. I'm willing to meet you at $8800. Can you meet me there?
I'm getting close, but I think I can do better than $8800. I'm willing to meet you at $8400. Can you consider that?
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $8800 and $8400. I'll offer the product to you for $8600. Can you consider that?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you at $8300. Can you consider that?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $8400. Can you consider that?
I think we're very close now, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $8200. If you're not willing to go any lower, I'll have to consider other options.
